item.title: Jacqulyn add a quote by Anaïs Nin
item.description: "He, who had done more than any human being to draw her out of the caves of her secret, folded life, now threw her down into deeper recesses of fear and doubt. The fall was greater than she had ever known, because she had ventured so far into emotion and had abandoned herself to it." -- Anaïs Nin

item.title: Jacqulyn add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "So many people enter and leave your life! Hundreds of thousands of people! You have to keep the door open so they can come in! But it also means you have to let them go!" -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Jacqulyn add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "I felt suddenly shy. I was not used to shy. I was used to shame. Shyness is when you turn your head away from something you want. Shame is when you turn your head away from something you do not want." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Jacqulyn add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "It's the tragedy of loving, you can't love anything more than something you miss." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Jacqulyn add a quote by John Irving
item.description: "In this dirty minded world, you are either someone's wife or someone's whore. And if you're not either people think there is something wrong with you....but there is nothing wrong with me" -- John Irving

item.title: Jacqulyn add a quote by Normal Mailer
item.description: "He had the look of a man who has conflicting worries and is worrying over which one to worry first." -- Normal Mailer

item.title: Jacqulyn add a quote by Hugh Laurie
item.description: "I looked at her and sighed. In another world, I thought to myself, it might have worked. In another world, in another universe, in another time, as two quite different people, we really might have been able to put all of this behind us, take off to some sun-drenched Caribbean island, and have sex and pineapple juice, non-stop, for a year." -- Hugh Laurie

item.title: Jacqulyn add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "But now," says the Once-ler, "now that you're here, the word of the Lorax seems perfectly clear. UNLESS someone like you cares a whole awful lot, nothing is going to get better. It's not." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Jacqulyn add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "We are what we pretend to be, so we must be careful about what we pretend to be." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Jacqulyn add a quote by Edwidge Danticat
item.description: "Misery won't touch you gentle. It always leaves its thumbprints on you; sometimes it leaves them for others to see, sometimes for nobody but you to know of." -- Edwidge Danticat

item.title: Jacqulyn add a quote by Lynda Barry
item.description: "No matter what, expect the unexpected. And whenever possible BE the unexpected." -- Lynda Barry

item.title: Jacqulyn add a quote by Markus Zusak
item.description: "I have hated words and I have loved them, and I hope I have made them right." -- Markus Zusak

item.title: Jacqulyn add a quote by John Irving
item.description: "Your memory is a monster; <i>you</i> forget - <i>it</i> doesn't. It simply files things away. It keeps things for you, or hides things from you - and summons them to your recall with a will of its own. You think you have a memory; but it has you!" -- John Irving

item.title: Jacqulyn add a quote by Erin Morgenstern
item.description: "The past stays on you the way powdered sugar stays on your fingers. Some people can get rid of it but it’s still there, the events and things that pushed you to where you are now." -- Erin Morgenstern

item.title: Jacqulyn add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "Love is so short, forgetting is so long." -- Pablo Neruda
